body:
Recognize Election Day as a federal holiday.  

Pass legislation that establishes Election Day as a "major" holiday, to be grouped with holidays that celebrate the foundations of this country, including Independence Day, Memorial Day, and Labor Day.

Educate the general public about the issues, current and proposed legislation, and Election Day procedure.  

Encourage private businesses to close for the day in order to allow their employees to vote.

Combat low voter turnout through education and greater opportunity.
title: Make Election Day a National Holiday.
